home.title: Hi! I'm Marcelo Cabral
home.subtitle: I am a Web Developer passionate about technology, I have been in the IT market since 2019 with experience in Development and QA.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Here you will find information about me, such as my experience and skills within programming.
info-description: I am passionate about building applications and have been working as an IT professional since 2019. I graduated in Systems Analysis and Development in 2020, and since then I have had experience in the IT area as a Quality Assurance and as a developer.

As a developer, I worked on the modernization of an investment platform for a large bank using Angular versions 8 and 12, Jasmine, Jest, Oracle CMS, CloudBees, Google Analytics, and more. As a QA, I worked on creating and executing test cases, HP ALM, Octane, and BDD techniques for agile development.
I am open to job opportunities where I can contribute, learn and grow. If you have an opportunity that matches my skills and experience, please contact me.
